mapper.insert: INSERT INTO books (title, author, isbn, published_year) VALUES (#{title}, #{author}, #{isbn}, #{publishedYear})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM books WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE books SET title = #{title}, author = #{author}, isbn = #{isbn}, published_year = #{publishedYear} WHERE id = #{id}
